original_text: Nebuzaradan the commander of the guard carried into exile the people who remained in the city, along with the rest of the populace and those who had deserted to the king of Babylon.
korean_text: 성 중에 남아 있는 백성과 바벨론 왕에게 항복한 자들과 무리 중 남은 자는 시위대장 느부사라단이 모두 사로잡아 가고

sentences.original_text: Nebuzaradan the commander of the guard
carried into exile the people who remained in the city
sentences.korean_translation: 성에 남아있는 사람들을 사로잡아 끌고 갔으니

sentences.original_text: along with the rest of the populace
and those who had deserted to the king of Babylon
